metadata.title: Liquid Foundation Makeup Sunscreen 2 Pcs 35ml Waterproof Oil Control Moisturizing Lightweight Non Stick Concealer Foundation for Face and Body in Glass Bottle with 2 Pcs Black Makeup Sponge

categorization.explanation: The product is a liquid foundation makeup which is used on the face, hence it falls under the 'Face' subcategory of 'Makeup' in 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
